mutants.code:
def concatenate_words(string):
    string = string.replace('', '')
    string = string.lower()
    string = ''.join((e for e in string if e.isalnum()))
    string = ''.join(sorted(string))
    return string

def concatenate_words(string):
    string = string.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    string = string.lower()
    string = ''.join((e for e in string if e.isalnum()))
    string = ''.join(sorted(string))
    return string

mutants.original_line: string = ''.join(e for e in string if e.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: string = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in string if e.isalnum()))

def concatenate_words(string):
    string = string.replace(' ', '')
    string = string.lower()
    string = ''.join((e for e in string if e.isalnum()))
